We Hate to See You Go!

We'd love to continue being your natural gas provider. Please reconsider with one of these great plans:

  • $0.299per Ccf**

    Variable Select

    The Variable Plan with a discount – for new ONG residential customers only – has a guaranteed savings of at least 20% off of ONG's Variable Plan at the standard price for the first two months of service. This plan does not require a long-term commitment - you can change to another plan at any time with no additional charges!

    Select Plan
    + Additional Information
    • Upon expiration of the discount, customers will remain on our Variable Plan with service at the standard rate in effect at that time.
    • Variable rate may change or stay the same each month based on market conditions. June 2017 Variable Plan discounted rate is $0.299.
    • June 2017 Variable Plan standard rate is $0.599.

    The Variable Plan with a discount – for new ONG residential customers only – has a guaranteed savings of at least 20% off of ONG's Variable Plan at the standard price for the first two months of service. This plan does not require a long-term commitment - you can change to another plan at any time with no additional charges!

    • Upon expiration of the discount, customers will remain on our Variable Plan with service at the standard rate in effect at that time.
    • Variable rate may change or stay the same each month based on market conditions. June 2017 Variable Plan discounted rate is $0.299.
    • June 2017 Variable Plan standard rate is $0.599.
  • $0.519per Ccf**

    6-Month Fixed Plan

    If you choose our 6-Month Fixed price plan, you will be billed at a fixed price per Ccf for the length of your contract. This fixed price plan gives you the peace of mind of knowing exactly what you will pay for the gas you use over the 6 months of your contract.

    Select Plan
    + Additional Information

    If you choose our 6-Month Fixed price plan, you will be billed at a fixed price per Ccf for the length of your contract. This fixed price plan gives you the peace of mind of knowing exactly what you will pay for the gas you use over the 6 months of your contract.

If you would like to cancel service, please call 1-888-466-4427, so we can provide you with pertinent details. We are available 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. EST, Monday-Friday. Thank you and we hope you will consider Ohio Natural Gas in the future.

*Rates and Price Plans effective 08/05/2017 to 09/04/2017

Enrollment eligibility, price plan availability and actual customer service charge, deposit requirement, and price per therm are subject to GNG's credit and payment policies. See gng.com for price plans and customer service charge ranges. All price plans are subject to GNG's terms and conditions of service. GNG reserves the right to change or limit the availability of certain price plans.

GNG's variable prices listed on the site apply to customers with a beginning meter reading date (which appears as the “Prior Meter Reading Date” on the bill) on or after 09/05/2017. GNG customers on a variable plan may choose another GNG price plan for which they qualify without a credit check.
